title: Sports Arena Triple Set, San Diego
content:
Consider the following skateboarding’s roll of honor:

Jeremy Wray – Ollie – TWS ‘The Reason’
Ryan Decenzo – flip – Bust or Bail: Cinco de Slammo
Cyril Jackson – Bs 180 – Bust or Bail: Cinco de Slammo
Tommy Sandoval – Fs 180 & Fs flip – Bust or Bail: Cinco de Slammo
Enzo Cautela – Hardflip – Bust or Bail: Cinco de Slammo
Chris Joslin – Tre & bs bigspin – Bust or Bail: Cinco de Slammo
author: simon
